duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot and repair medical devices inside hospitals and other clinical settings.
Perform hardware parts replacement, software updates, and calibrations.
Conduct preventative maintenance and assist in the installation of new devices at customer locations.
Perform routine system checks, record data from product tests, and maintain stock of parts and tools.
Travel locally and be available on-call, including nights and weekends.

education_certification.credential: Associate's or Bachelor's degree in a related field (e.g. Biomedical Technology, Engineering, IT)
